text.4: lostHello name Adam and struggling years and afraid past years thoughts suicide fear anxiety close limit quiet long and scared come family feelings years ago losing aunt triggered Everyday feeling hopeless lost guilty and remorseful and things done life but thoughts like little experienced life time revealed feelings family broke saw cuts Watching get worried something portrayed average day made me feel absolutely dreadful later found attempt survivor attempt OD overdose pills and attempt hanging happened blackout pills and never went noose because still afraid first therapy diagnosed severe depression social anxiety and eating disorder later transferred fucken group therapy reason made me feel anxious Eventually last session therapy showed me results daily check feelings step survey me and mom dad Come find putting feeling horrible and afraid anxious everyday mom absolutely amazing me described happiest ever seen me therapy helped eventually put Sertaline anti anxiety or anti depression sorry forgot but never finished first prescription ever found right type anti depressant because mom thought wanted drugs took me recommended pill schedule week and stopped me taking time feeling worse afraid damage worry caused even everything going afraid ever relapsed cutting and developed severe insomnia Day day feeling hopeless worthless questioning still motivation move bed and keep going ask myself nearly every night almost break everytime Please Please Please someone anyone help me scared might something drastic shaped fear and anxiety Not Know anymore
